His numbers have been consistently nerfed since his release.  People said that you could grind his damage into the dirt and he'd _still_ be viable because of the insane utility his kit provides. Another thing that annoys the hell out of me is that she can still reactivate her Q while she is in the middle of someone's crowd control effect or in a stasis state like {{item:3157}}, and that she will always return to her ult location after being hit by CC. Sure the "counter play" is to go to her original location but that requires you to ether have a long range cc ability OR dive deep into the enemy team just to get at her espically when she combo the ult with {{summoner:4}}

Could you give me proof that half a morellonomicon Zoe can one-shot an enemy with her combo? And even if she can, there are other mids that can kill other squishies with a full rotation while on very few items.

The bubble bonus on wakeup only does true damage because of how the double damage is coded.

As someone who played Zoe quite a bit before they changed how her Q and R interact, it IS possible to 1 shot people with E Q with a Morellonomicon, but with a Codex and Lost Chapter you can do roughly... 75% of people's health with E and max range Q. But that's incredibly hard to pull off in mid lane considering her entire counterplay consists of hiding behind a minion so you'll never get hit with E. Even if Zoe R's in to E, it's incredibly easy to sidestep + you know exactly where she'll land to place ur entire combo.

And other midlaners can chunk/100-0 easily too with a full combo and first item, so I really don’t see why people are acting like this is exclusive to Zoe.

But I do agree with you; it’s incredibly hard to land an E during laning phase against good opponents.

That Dev only makes anti fun to play vs champs.  The only ones he has touched that are ok are the ones that OTHERS touched too.

His designed are flat out toxic to the game.

Nerfs do not make un-fun concepts any more fun to face.
When they can correct mistakes easier than you can cause them for your opponent, it becomes a problem of "do I want to play this matchup?

In HotS we just got Hanzo and Genji, of Overwatch fame. They're far from the most dangerous opponents-- Genji is more likely to feed than most of his competition. But people ban at least one of them (2 bans per team, mind) because they're ass to face-- for no mana and a relatively safe cooldown, Genji has three escape buttons which makes him almost impossible to catch out. Hanzo also has an escape on a fair cooldown without cost.
It's not that their powerful or that their escapes enable busted plays. Nobody wants to face them because it's unrewarding and difficult. They're just asinine patterns; by all accounts the kill should be yours, but both characters will escape 9/10 times unless they've initiated or gone really ham on you-- and even then, most times it won't be enough. Rather than deal with the frustration of watching an opponent who can escape you under virtually any circumstances, they just get banned. Not because it's broken or they're gamechangers. Just because in almost any matchup, they're more frustration than it's ever worth.

This is exactly why I ban Yasuo every single game.  I can beat him on the enemy team.  I can carry a bad one on my team.  I just hate his entire existence.  Even when his win rate is <50% he is just unfun to lane against and unfun to have on my team.  I know there are champs that need to be banned with higher priority right now, I just have had my fill of seeing Yasuo so I will never see him again.
